original: Lobhādhiṭṭhānaṁ dosādhiṭṭhānaṁ mohādhiṭṭhānaṁ alobhādhiṭṭhānaṁ adosādhiṭṭhānaṁ amohādhiṭṭhānaṁ
analyzed: lobha adhiṭṭhānam dosa adhiṭṭhānam moha adhiṭṭhānam a lobha adhiṭṭhānam a dosa adhiṭṭhānam a moha adhiṭṭhānam
kāya kamma adhiṭṭhānam vācā kamma adhiṭṭhānam manaḥ kamma adhiṭṭhānam saddhindriya adhiṭṭhāna
vīriya indriya adhiṭṭhānam sati indriya adhiṭṭhānam samādhi indriya adhiṭṭhānam paññindriya adhiṭṭhānam
bhiyyas taṇhā pavaḍḍhati iti kāma taṇhā

original: Esa gāḷhaṁ karoti bandhananti rāgaṁ, iti yo yo dhammo mūlanikkhitto, so yevettha dhammo uggāvahitabbo.
analyzed: esa gāḷham karoti rāgaḥ iti yaḥ yaḥ dhammo mūla nikkhitto saḥ yeva ittha dhammo uggāvahitabbo

original: Na bhagavā ekaṁ dhammaṁ ārabbha aññaṁ dhammaṁ deseti.
analyzed: na bhagavā ekam dhammam ārabbha aññam dhammam deseti

original: Yassa vitakketi kāmavitakko tameva vitakkaṁ kāmavitakkena niddisīyati.
analyzed: yassa vitakka iti kāma vitakkaḥ tam eva vitakkam kāma vitakkena niddisīyati
tibba rāgassa ati tassa iva vitakkassa vatthum niddisati

original: Subhānupassino bhiyyo taṇhā pavaḍḍhatīti tameva rāgaṁ kāmataṇhāti niddisati.
analyzed: subha anupassinaḥ bhiyyas taṇhā pavaḍḍhati iti tam eva rāgam kāma taṇhā iti niddisati

original: Esa gāḷhaṁ karoti bandhananti tameva taṇhāsaṁyojanaṁ niddisati.
analyzed: esa gāḷham karoti tam eva taṇhā sayojanam niddisati

original: Tattha bhagavā ekaṁ dhammaṁ tividhaṁ niddisati, nissandato hetuto phalato.
analyzed: tattha bhagavā ekam dhammam tividham niddisati nissandataḥ hetutaḥ phalataḥ

original: Dadanti yaṁ yaṁ dānaṁ, idaṁ dānamayikaṁ puññakriyaṁ.
analyzed: dadanti yam yam dāne idam dānamayikam puñña kriya

original: Bhajanti naṁ bahū, kittinti yo ca kalyāṇo kittisaddo loke abbhuggacchati, yaṁ bahukassa janassa piyo bhavati manāpo ca.
analyzed: bhajanti nam bahū yaḥ ca kalyāṇaḥ kitti saddaḥ loke abbhuggacchati yam bahukassa janassa piyaḥ bhavati manāpaḥ ca

original: Yañca avippaṭisārī kālaṁ karoti ayaṁ nissando.
analyzed: yat ca a vippaṭisārī kālam karoti ayam nissandaḥ

original: Yaṁ kāyassa bhedā devesu upapajjatīti idaṁ phalaṁ.
analyzed: yam kāyassa bhedā devesu upapajjati iti idam phala
yaḥ pāṇam atipāteti iti duṭṭhaḥ pāṇam atipāteti
musā vādañca bhāsati iti dosa upaghātāya musā vādañca bhāsati

original: Surāmerayapānañca, yo naro anuyuñjatīti doso nidānaṁ.
analyzed: surā meraya pānam ca yaḥ naraḥ anuyuñjati iti dosaḥ

original: Yo ca surāmerayapānaṁ anuyuñjati yathāparadāravihārī amittā janayanti.
analyzed: yaḥ ca surā meraya pānam anuyuñjati yathā apara dāra vihārī amittāḥ janayanti

original: Pañca verāni appahāyāti pañcannaṁ bhikkhāpadānaṁ samatikkamanaṁ sabbesaṁ dosajānaṁ
analyzed: pañca verāni appahāya ati pañcannam bhikkhāpadānam samatikkamanam sabbesam dosa jāna

original: sā paṇṇatti, teneva dosajanitena kammena dussīlo iti vuccati sopi dhammo hetunā niddisitabbo,
analyzed: sā paṇṇatti tena iva dosa janitena kammena dussīlaḥ iti vuccati saḥ api dhammaḥ hetunā niddisitabbo

original: dubbhāsitabhāsī ca hoti, duccintitacintī ca dukkaṭakammakārī ca.
analyzed: dubbhāsita bhāsī ca hoti duccintita cintī ca dukkaṭa kamma kārī ca

original: Tattha yaṁ kāyena ca vācāya ca parakkamati, idamassa dukkaṭakammakārī.
analyzed: tattha yam kāyena ca vācāya ca parakkamati idam assa dukkaṭa kamma kārī

original: Tāyaṁ yathā ca musāvādaṁ bhāsati yathā pubbaniddiṭṭhaṁ, idamassa dubbhāsitā.
analyzed: yathā ca musāvādam bhāsati yathā pubba niddiṭṭhaḥ idam assa dubbhāsi tā

original: Yañca saṅkappeti manoduccaritaṁ byāpādaṁ, idamassa duccintitacintitā.
analyzed: yat ca saṅkappeti manaḥ duccaritam byāpādaḥ idam assa duccintita cinti tā

original: Yaṁ so imehi tīhi bālalakkhaṇehi samannāgato tīṇi tajjāni dukkhāni domanassāni anubhavati, so ca hoti sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā tajjaṁ kathaṁ kathanti.
analyzed: yam saḥ imehi tīhi bāla lakkhaṇehi samannāgataḥ tīṇi tajjāni dukkhāni domanassāni anubhavati saḥ ca hoti sabhaggataḥ vā parisaggataḥ vā tajjam katham katham ti

original: Yadā bhavati so ca pāṇātipātādidasaakusalakammapatho, so tatonidānaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedetīti.
analyzed: yadā bhavati saḥ ca pāṇātipāta ādi dasa akusala kamma patho so tatonidānam dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti iti

original: Puna caparaṁ yadā passati coraṁ rājāparādhikaṁ raññā gahitaṁ jīvitā voropetaṁ, tassevaṁ
analyzed: puna ca param yadā passati coram rāja aparādhikam raññā gahitam jīvitā tassa iva

original: bhavati sace mamampi rājā jāneyya mamampi rājā gāhāpetvā jīvitā voropeyyāti, so tatonidānaṁ
analyzed: bhavati sace mamampi rājā jāneyya mamampi rājā gāhāpetvā jīvitā voropeyya ati saḥ tatonidāna

original: Puna caparaṁ bālo yadā bhavati āsanā samārūḷho yāva yā me gati bhavissati ito pecca paraṁ maraṇāti so tatonidānaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti iti bālalakkhaṇaṁ hetu.
analyzed: puna ca param bālaḥ yadā bhavati āsanā samārūḍhaḥ yāva yā me gati bhavissati itas pecca param so tatonidānam dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti iti bāla lakkhaṇam hetu

original: Kāyassa bhedā nirayesu upapajjati, idaṁ phalaṁ.
analyzed: kāyassa bhedā nirayesu upapajjati idam phala

original: Yo yaṁ anamataggasaṁsāraṁ samāpanno jāyate ca mīyate ca, ayaṁ avijjāhetukā.
analyzed: yaḥ yam anamatagga sasāram samāpannaḥ jāyate ca mīyate ca ayam avijjā hetukā

original: Yānipi ca saṅkhārānaṁ payojanāni, tānipi avijjāpaccayāni, yaṁ adassanaṁ buddhavacanassa, ayaṁ avijjāsutteyeva niddiṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: yāni api ca saṅkhārānam payojanāni tāni api avijjā paccayāni yam a dassanam buddha vacanassa ayam

original: Yo ca saṅkhāre attato harati pañcakkhandhe pañca diṭṭhiyo upagacchati.
analyzed: yaḥ ca saṅkhāre attataḥ harati pañca kkhandhe pañca diṭṭhiyaḥ upagacchati

original: “Etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti idaṁ suttaṁ avijjāya nikkhittaṁ, avijjāya nikkhipitaṁ.
analyzed: etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā ati idam suttam avijjāya nikkhitta avijjāya nikkhipita

original: Evaṁ satthā sutte nayena dhammena niddisati.
analyzed: evam satthā sutte nayena dhammena niddisati

original: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā “idaṁ dukkhan”ti nappajānanti cattāri saccāni vitthārena, yaṁ tattha appajānanā, idaṁ dukkhaṁ, ayaṁ hetu.
analyzed: ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā idam dukkhan ti na pajānanti cattāri saccāni vitthārena yam tattha appajānanā idam dukkha ayam hetu

original: Appajānanto vividhe saṅkhāre abhisaṅkharoti, ayaṁ nissando.
analyzed: appajānantaḥ vividhe saṅkhāre abhisaṅkharoti ayam nissandaḥ

original: Yañca diṭṭhigatāni parāmasati “idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan”ti ayaṁ nissando.
analyzed: yat ca diṭṭhi gatāni parāmasati idam eva saccam mogham aññanti ayam nissandaḥ

original: Ayampi dhammo saniddiṭṭho hetuto ca phalato ca nissandato ca.
analyzed: ayam pi dhammo sa niddiṭṭhaḥ hetuto ca phalato ca nissandato ca

original: Ettha pana keci dhammā sādhāraṇā bhavanti.
analyzed: ettha pana keci dhammā sādhāraṇāḥ bhavanti
hetu khalu āditoyā iva sutte nikkhipissanti

original: Yathā kiṁ bhave cattārimāni, bhikkhave, agatigamanāni.
analyzed: yathā kim bhave cattāri imāni bhikkhave agati gamanāni

original: Tattha yañca chandāgatiṁ gacchati yañca bhayāgatiṁ gacchati, ayaṁ lobho akusalamūlaṁ.
analyzed: tattha yat ca chandāgatim gacchati yat ca bhayāgatim gacchati ayam lobhaḥ akusala mūla

original: Evaṁ imāni tīṇi akusalamūlāni āditoyeva upaparikkhitabbāni.
analyzed: evam imāni tīṇi akusala mūlāni āditoyā iva upaparikkhitabbāni

original: Yattha ekaṁ niddisitabbaṁ, tattha ekaṁ niddisīyati.
Tathā dve yathā tīṇi, na hi ādīhi anikkhitte hetu vā nissando vā phalaṁ vā niddisitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tathā dve yathā tīṇi na hi ādīhi a nikkhitte hetu vā nissandaḥ vā phalam vā

original: Kattha chandā ca ayaṁ lobho yathā niddiṭṭhaṁ pubbe.
analyzed: kattha chandā ca ayam lobho yathā niddiṭṭham pubbe

original: Tattha yā asubhāya upaparikkhā, ayaṁ kāmesu ādīnavadassanena pariccāgo.
analyzed: tattha yā asubhāya upaparikkhā ayam kāmesu ādīnava dassanena pariccāgaḥ

original: Indriyesu susaṁvuto tasseva alobhassa pāripūriyaṁ mama āyatanasocitaṁ anupādāya.
analyzed: indriyesu tassa iva alobhassa pāripūriyam mama an upādāya

original: Iti ayaṁ alobho asubhānupassitāya vatthuto dhārayati, so alobho hetu.
analyzed: iti ayam alobhaḥ asubha anupassitāya vatthutaḥ dhārayati saḥ alobhaḥ hetu

original: Indriyesu guttadvāratāya gocarato dhārayati, bhojanemattaññutāya parato dhārayati, ayaṁ nissando.
analyzed: indriyesu guttadvāra tāya gocarataḥ dhārayati bhojanemattaññutāya paratas dhārayati ayam nissandaḥ

original: Taṁ ve nappasahati māro, vāto selaṁ va pabbatanti, idaṁ phalaṁ.
analyzed: tam ve nappasahati māraḥ vātaḥ selam va idam phala

original: Iti yoyeva dhammo ādimhi nikkhitto, soyeva majjhe ceva avasāne ca.
analyzed: iti yaḥ yeva dhammaḥ ādimhi nikkhitto saḥ yeva majjhe ca iva avasāne ca

original: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, aññaṁ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi asamuppannassa kāmacchandassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā pahānāya, yathayidaṁ asubhanimittaṁ.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave aññam eka dhammam pi samanupassāmi a samuppannassa kāmacchandassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā pahānāya yathayidam asubha nimitta

original: Tattha asubhanimittaṁ manasikarontassa anuppanno ceva kāmacchando na uppajjati, uppanno ca kāmacchando pahīyati.
analyzed: tattha asubha nimittam manasikarontassa anuppannaḥ ca iva kāmacchandaḥ na uppajjati uppannaḥ ca kāmacchandaḥ pahīyati

original: Yaṁ puna anuppanno kāmarāgo pariyādiyati rūparāgaṁ arūparāgaṁ, iti phalaṁ.
analyzed: yam puna an uppannaḥ kāma rāgaḥ rūpa rāgam a rūpa rāgaḥ iti

original: Iti ayampi ca dhammo niddiṭṭho hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.
analyzed: iti ayam pi ca dhammaḥ niddiṭṭhaḥ hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca
ekam pi ce pāṇam a duṭṭha cittaḥ

original: Ekampi ce pāṇamaduṭṭhacitto mettāyatīti ayaṁ adoso.
analyzed: ekam pi ce pāṇam aduṭṭha cittaḥ mettāyati iti ayam adosaḥ

original: Nigghātena assādo, kusalo tena hotīti tena kusalena dhammena saṁyutto dhammapaññattiṁ gacchati.
analyzed: nigghātena assādo kusalo tena hoti iti tena kusalena dhammena sayuttaḥ dhamma paññattim gacchati

original: Kusaloti yathā paññāya pañño paṇḍiccena paṇḍito.
analyzed: kusalaḥ ti yathā paññāya paññaḥ paṇḍiccena paṇḍitaḥ

original: Pahūtamariyo pakaroti puññanti tassāyeva vipāko ayaṁ lokiyassa, na hi lokuttarassa.
analyzed: pahūta mariyaḥ pakaroti vipākaḥ ayam lokiyassa na hi lokuttarassa

original: Yāva abyāpajjo bhūmiyaṁ bahupuññaṁ pasavati, idaṁ phalaṁ.
analyzed: yāva a byāpajjaḥ bhūmiyam bahu puññam pasavati idam

original: Iti adoso niddiṭṭho hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.
analyzed: iti adosaḥ niddiṭṭhaḥ hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca

original: Tattha yā mettācetovimutti, ayaṁ ariyadhammesu rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, lokikāya bhūmikā hetu, yaṁ sukhaṁ āyatiṁ manāpo hoti manussānaṁ, ime ekādasa dhammā nissando.
analyzed: tattha yā mettā cetaḥ vimutti ayam ariya dhammesu rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti lokikāya bhūmikā hetu yam sukham āyatim manāpaḥ hoti manussāna ime ekādasa dhammā nissandaḥ
nibbedha gāminī iti nibbāna gāminī yam yathābhūtam paṭivijjhati

original: Iti amoho niddiṭṭho hetunā ca nissandena ca phalena ca.
analyzed: iti amohaḥ niddiṭṭhaḥ hetunā ca nissandena ca phalena ca

original: Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, indriyāni anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ aññindriyaṁ aññātāvindriyaṁ.
analyzed: tīṇi imāni bhikkhave indriyāni aññindriyam aññātāvindriya

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anabhisametassa dukkhassa ariyasaccassa abhisamayāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati, vīriyaṁ ārabhati, cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu an abhisametassa dukkhassa ariya saccassa abhisamayāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu “idaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccan”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, yā ca maggo, idaṁ aññindriyaṁ.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu idam dukkham ariya saccanti yathābhūtam pajānāti yā ca maggo idam aññindriya

original: Āsavakkhayā anāsavo hoti, idaṁ vuccati aññātāvindriyaṁ.
analyzed: āsava kkhayā anāsavaḥ hoti idam vuccati aññātāvindriya

original: Yaṁ chandaṁ janeti vāyamati, yā pajānāti, ayaṁ nissando.
analyzed: yam chandam janeti vāyamati yā pajānāti ayam nissandaḥ

original: Yena sabbaso āsavānaṁ khayā hetu, yaṁ khaye ñāṇamuppajjati, anuppāde ñāṇañca, ayaṁ nissando.
analyzed: yena sabbasas āsavānam khayā hetu yam khaye ñāṇam uppajjati anuppāde ñāṇam ca ayam nissandaḥ

original: Tattha khīṇā me jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyanti, idaṁ khaye ñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: khīṇā me jāti vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīyanti idam khaye

original: Nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmīti idaṁ anuppāde ñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāmi iti idam anuppāde ñāṇa

original: Iti imāni indriyāni amoho niddiṭṭho hetunā ca nissandena ca phalena ca.
analyzed: iti imāni indriyāni amohaḥ niddiṭṭhaḥ hetunā ca nissandena ca phalena ca
kusalam ca vaḥ bhikkhave desessāmi kusala mūlam ca iva
a lobhaḥ a dosaḥ a mohaḥ

original: Yañca alobho tīṇi kammāni samuṭṭhāpeti saṅkappaṁ vāyāmaṁ samādhiñca, ayaṁ alobhassa nissando.
analyzed: yat ca alobho tīṇi kammāni samuṭṭhāpeti saṅkappam vāyāmam samādhim ca ayam alobhassa nissando

original: Yaṁ tayo dhamme paṭṭhapeti sammāvācaṁ sammākammantaṁ sammāājīvañca, ayaṁ nissando.
analyzed: yam tayo dhamme paṭṭhapeti sammāvācam sammākammantam sammāājīvam ca ayam nissandaḥ

original: Tattha yo amoho hetu, yaṁ dve dhamme upaṭṭhapeti aviparītadassanampi ca anabhilāpanaṁ, ayaṁ nissando.
analyzed: tattha yaḥ amohaḥ hetu yam dve dhamme upaṭṭhapeti aviparīta dassanam pi ca anabhilāpana ayam nissandaḥ

original: Imassa brahmacariyassa yaṁ phalaṁ, tā dve vimuttiyo rāgavirāgā cetovimutti avijjā virāgā ca paññāvimutti, idaṁ phalaṁ.
analyzed: imassa brahmacariyassa yam tāḥ dve vimuttiyaḥ rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti avijjā virāgā ca paññā vimutti idam phala

original: Iti imāni tīṇi kusalamūlāni niddiṭṭhāni hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.
analyzed: iti imāni tīṇi kusala mūlāni niddiṭṭhāni hetutaḥ ca nissandataḥ ca phalataḥ ca
tulam atulam ca sambhavanti tula saṅkhatam a tula saṅkhata

original: Tattha ye saṅkhatā tulaṁ, te dve dhammā assādo ca ādīnavo ca tulitā bhavanti.
analyzed: tattha ye te dve dhammā assādaḥ ca ādīnavaḥ ca tulitā bhavanti

original: Ettako ādīnavo imassa, idaṁ nissaraṇanti iti nibbānaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: ettakaḥ ādīnavaḥ imassa idam nissaraṇam ti iti nibbānam pajānāti

original: Dvīhi kāraṇehi atulaṁ na ca sakkā tulayituṁ.
analyzed: dvīhi kāraṇehi atulam na ca sakkā tulayitu

original: Ettakaṁ etaṁ netaṁ paramatthīti tena atulaṁ.
analyzed: ettakam etam na itam param atthi iti tena

original: Atha pāpuṇā ratanaṁ karitvā acchariyabhāvena atulaṁ.
analyzed: atha pāpuṇā ratanam karitvā acchariya bhāvena

original: Tattha kusalassa ca abhisambhavā jānanā passanā, ayaṁ amoho.
analyzed: tattha kusalassa ca abhisambhavāḥ jānanā passanā ayam amoho

original: Yaṁ tattha ñātā osiraṇā bhavasaṅkhārānaṁ, ayaṁ alobho.
Yaṁ ajjhattarato samāhitoti vikkhepapaṭisaṁharaṇā, ayaṁ adoso.
analyzed: yam ajjhattarataḥ samāhitaḥ ti vikkhepa paṭisaharaṇā ayam adoso

original: Yo bhavasaṅkhārānaṁ samosaraṇaṁ lobho sammāsamādhīnaṁ assādo, ayaṁ hetu.
analyzed: yaḥ samosaraṇam lobho sammāsamādhīnam assādaḥ ayam hetu

original: Yaṁ ajjhattarato avijjaṇḍakosaṁ sambhedo, ayaṁ nissando.
Sā pavatti imāni tīṇi niddiṭṭhāni kusalamūlāni hetuto ca nissandato ca phalato ca.
analyzed: sā pavatti imāni tīṇi niddiṭṭhāni kusala mūlāni hetutaḥ ca nissandataḥ ca phalataḥ ca

original: Ettāvatā esā pavatti ca nivatti ca akusalamūlehi pavattati, kusalamūlehi nivattatīti imehi ca tīhi sabbaṁ akusalamūlaṁ samosaraṇaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: ettāvatā esā pavatti ca nivatti ca akusala mūlehi pavattati kusala mūlehi nivattati iti imehi ca tīhi sabbam akusala mūlam samosaraṇam gacchati

original: So dhamme vā vacanato niddiṭṭho taṇhāti vā kodhoti vā asampajaññanti vā anusayoti
analyzed: so dhamme vā vacanataḥ niddiṭṭho taṇhā ati vā kodho iti vā asampajaññam ti vā anusayo ti

original: vā makkhoti vā paḷāsoti vā assatīti vā issāti vā macchariyanti vā aññāṇanti vā, tehi
analyzed: vā makkhoti vā paḷāsoti vā assati iti vā issā ti vā macchariyanti vā aññāṇanti vā tehi

original: Yassimāni dve vacanāni dhammapadāni niddiṭṭhāni na so atthi kilesā, yo imesu navasu padesu samodhānaṁ samosaraṇaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: yassa imāni dve vacanāni dhamma padāni niddiṭṭhāni na saḥ atthi kilesāḥ yaḥ imesu navasu padesu samodhānam samosaraṇam gacchati

original: Ayaṁ kileso, na ca lobho, na ca doso, na ca moho.
analyzed: ayam kilesaḥ na ca lobhaḥ na ca dosaḥ na ca mohaḥ

original: Yathā akusalamūlāni, evaṁ kusalāni paṭikkhepena niddisitabbāni.
analyzed: yathā akusala mūlāni evam kusalāni paṭikkhepena niddisitabbāni

original: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī, idaṁ kāyakammādhiṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: pāṇa atipātā veramaṇī adinna ādānā veramaṇī kāmesu micchā ācārā veramaṇī idam kāya kamma adhiṭṭhāna
dhammam bhaṇe na adhammam tam dutiya
piyam bhaṇe na appiyam tam tatiya
cattāri imāni ca vacī su caritāni idam

original: Tīṇimāni manosucaritāni, anabhijjhā, abyāpādo, sammādiṭṭhi, idaṁ manokammādhiṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: tīṇi imāni manaḥ su caritāni anabhijjhā a byāpādaḥ sammādiṭṭhi idam manaḥ kamma adhiṭṭhāna
vācā anurakkhī manasā su sa vutaḥ
kāya kamma pārisuddhi vācā kamma pārisuddhi manaḥ kamma pārisuddhi

original: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī.
analyzed: pāṇa atipātā veramaṇī adinna ādānā veramaṇī kāmesumicchā ācārā veramaṇī

original: Iti sādhāraṇāni ca suttāni asādhāraṇāni ca suttāni paṭivijjhitabbāni.
analyzed: iti sādhāraṇāni ca suttāni asādhāraṇāni ca suttāni paṭivijjhitabbāni

original: Paṭivijjhitvā vācāya kāyena ca suttassa attho niddisitabbo.
analyzed: paṭivijjhitvā vācāya kāyena ca suttassa atthaḥ niddisitabbaḥ
cattāro me bhikkhave sammappadhānāḥ idam vīriya adhiṭṭhāna

original: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā vitthārena kātabbā, idaṁ satindriyādhiṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: cattāro sati paṭṭhānāḥ vitthārena kātabbāḥ idam sati indriya adhiṭṭhāna
sabbe na jaññā kasiṇā api pāṇinaḥ

original: savitakko savicāro, avitakko vicāramatto, avitakko avicāro.
analyzed: sa vitakko sa vicāraḥ a vitakkaḥ vicāra mattaḥ a vitakkaḥ a vicāraḥ
paññā hi seṭṭhā lokasmin ti vitthārena

original: sutamayī, cintāmayī, bhāvanāmayī, idaṁ paññindriyādhiṭṭhānaṁ suttaṁ, imāni indriyādhiṭṭhānāni asādhāraṇāni suttāni.
analyzed: suta mayī cintā mayī bhāvanā mayī idam paññindriya adhiṭṭhānam sutte imāni indriya adhiṭṭhānāni asādhāraṇāni suttāni
tattha katamāni sādhāraṇāni indriya adhiṭṭhānāni suttāni

original: Yaṁ yassa sambandhaṁ kusalassa vā akusalassa vā tena tena adhiṭṭhānena taṁ suttaṁ niddisitabbaṁ, natthañño dhammo niddisitabbo.
analyzed: yam yassa sambandham kusalassa vā akusalassa vā tena tena adhiṭṭhānena tam suttam niddisitabba natthañño dhammaḥ niddisitabbaḥ

original: Tattha sādhāraṇaṁ kusalaṁ nāpi kusalaṁ akusalaṁ yathā sādhāraṇāni ca kusalamūlāni sādhāraṇāni ca akusalamūlāni uppannaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ pajahati …pe…
analyzed: tattha sādhāraṇam kusalam na api kusalam akusalam yathā sādhāraṇāni ca kusala mūlāni sādhāraṇāni ca akusala mūlāni uppannam kāma vitakkam pajahati pe

original: Iti therassa mahākaccāyanassa jambuvanavāsino peṭakopadese tatiyabhūmi suttādhiṭṭhānaṁ nāma.
analyzed: iti therassa mahākaccāyanassa jambu vana vāsino peṭaka upadese tatiya bhūmi suttādhiṭṭhānam nāma
